About.title: Our Story
About.subtitle: Discover the passion behind every plate and our journey to culinary excellence.
About.ourJournalDesc: Founded in 2026, SmartDine was born from a simple yet ambitious dream: to redefine the modern diner experience. We believe that fine dining shouldn't just be about the food, but about the atmosphere, the connections, and the stories shared over a perfect cup of coffee or a gourmet artisanal burger.
About.commitmentDesc: We are committed to quality that you can taste. Every ingredient is sourced from local, ethical growers and artisanal producers who share our passion for excellence and sustainability.
About.chefDesc: Our culinary team, led by world-class chefs, focuses on blending classic comfort food with modern techniques to create dishes that are both familiar and surprisingly innovative.

Events.title: Private Events
Events.subtitle: Host your next unforgettable gathering in our beautiful, boutique spaces.
Events.introDesc: From intimate birthday dinners and romantic engagements to high-level corporate luncheons, our dedicated events team ensures every detail is perfect.
Events.theAlcoveDesc: An intimate, candle-lit space for up to 12 guests. Perfect for private family dinners or small team celebrations.
Events.theGrandRoomDesc: A bright, airy space with large windows and an urban vibe. Accommodates up to 50 guests for cocktail receptions or corporate events.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about dining with us.
FAQ.a1: While we welcome walk-ins, we highly recommend making a reservation, especially during weekends and evenings, to ensure we have a table ready for you.
FAQ.q2: Do you offer vegetarian or vegan options?
FAQ.a2: Yes! Our menu features a variety of gourmet vegetarian and vegan dishes, clearly marked for your convenience.
FAQ.a3: We maintain a smart-casual dress code. We want you to feel comfortable while enjoying our premium dining atmosphere.
FAQ.q4: Can I host a large group or private event?
FAQ.a4: Absolutely. We have dedicated spaces for private events. Please visit our Private Events page or contact our team for more details.
FAQ.a5: Yes, we offer complimentary valet parking for all our guests at the main entrance.
FAQ.a6: We are open Monday to Friday from 8:00 AM to 11:00 PM, and Saturday to Sunday from 9:00 AM to midnight.
FAQ.supportDesc: We're here to help! If you couldn't find what you were looking for, feel free to reach out to our team at any time.
